definition: to accumulate/to hold in store/to contain/to gather together/to collect/depth/inner strength/profundity

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

sentences.english: Yet the attraction simmers on for the better part of the next two decades.
sentences.chinese: 然而，對更好的未來二十年的吸引力蘊積。
